name: Siren Head: The Siren's Forest
description:
After a heavy night drinking your character awakes in a haze, surrounded by empty rum bottles. You decide to go out for a drive to clear your head… However, you fall asleep at the wheel and end up in the Siren’s Forest!
You vaguely remember hearing the horrific news about three teenagers going missing it that area and realise you must find a way out as soon as possible.
However, you soon realise you are not alone in the forest….

GamePlay


The game is a first person linier indie horror game, based off of the works of Trevor Henderson. It includes multiple different methods of moving around the game including walking/Running, truck driving and boat rowing. The game also allows the player to interact with a phew certain objects such as lights, maps, and radios. A full IK system helps immerse the player in the horror game and also allows for full body animations.
